name: Circus Train Matchup Race
description:
Toot toot! Do you have a little train lover about that adores the circus and fun? Then hop on board for some delight-filled train ride with the Circus Train Match Up Race! Your little engineer kids will have a chug-a-chug-a-choochoo blast riding the circus train in this free puzzle game.

There are 4 circus and each have three gameplay mode, featuring happy and cute animal filled train cars and an engine. The first round in the relax train game mode. No time limit to find the pairs so can meet all the 4 circus objects (all together 48 items).
Racing mode is more exciting then relax. There is a timer, so you need to find all the 12 pairs at the time the train exit from the screen.
At 2 player versus mode you can play with your kid. Let's find out who is the best!
Another delight filled feature to the train games free that makes it even more fun then just match. This important element, and the matching itself, provides a real educational bonus, and playing also encourages:
-Fine motor skills
-Memory and recognition skills
-Hand eye coordination
-Early math concepts

And get ready for even more fun on the line with a real train noise! When the train matching game starts you will hear a train whistle and then fun circus music will play throughout to keep then chugging along happily.
Take a ride to the circus and have a roaring good time playing with circus animals in the Circus Train Puzzle matchup race game!
